title: scikits.learn 0.2 release
description: Today I released a new version of the scikits.learn library for machine learning. This new release includes the new libsvm bindings, Jake VanderPlas' BallTree algorithm for *fast* nearest neighbor queries in high dimension, etc. Here is the official announcement. As usual, it can be downloaded from sourceforge or from â€¦
